pages.text: SimpleTransport is a mod that adds conveyor-belts and extra items to build advanced transport-systems.

pages.title: Conveyor
pages.text: This is the basic Conveyor. It moves items from one side to the other.

pages.title: Conveyor-detecor
pages.text: When an item passes over this belt, a redstone-signal is emitted.

pages.title: Extractor
pages.text: To extract items from a chest or machine, you use this thing.

pages.title: Upper Extractor
pages.text: To extract items from a chest or machine above the extractor, you use this thing.

pages.title: Inserter
pages.text: This is the basic Inserter. It sucks up items in front of it, and puts it in a connected chest or machine.

pages.title: Destructor
pages.text: Sometimes you have too much of something. Transport them to the destructor and they will be deleted.

pages.title: Puller
pages.text: Moving items between belts can be done with the Puller. Items in front of it will be moved to the other side if the filter of the machine allows it.

pages.title: Vactractor
pages.text: Pulls items in a 4 x 4 area above it, and drops it below the vactractor. It does not connect to an inventory! Put a belt below it.
